timeline.author: Gaya

timeline.bodyText: Isn't this.fieldInput the DOM Node already?
timeline.author: Gaya

replies.bodyText: I didn't investigate too deeply, was just clearing out lint errors and I didn't want to fully rebuild these components. Also, these changes aren't necessary for the CSS update, so I'm happy to revert them if we feel it makes more sense to just focus on the style updates in this PR.
replies.author: kyleknighted

replies.bodyText: I'd leave it like this. I also ran into old components needing an update thus trigging a bunch of eslint errors. Suppressing is a good option in that case
replies.author: Gaya
